body.p: Shows the value of a system configuration parameter.

section.title: Description
section.p: SHOW displays the current settings of Greenplum Database system configuration parameters. You can set these parameters with the SET statement, or by editing the postgresql.conf configuration file of the Greenplum Database master. Note that some parameters viewable by SHOW are read-only â€” their values can be viewed but not set. See the Greenplum Database Reference Guide for details.
